title: Tile, 18th century
dimensions: H x W x D (laying flat): 13 x 13 cm (5 1/8 x 5 1/8 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund
description: Square tile. Medallion enclosing landscape with shepherdess seated on a fountain at the right, and animals at left. Colors: manganese, pale green, deep blue, chrome yellow and brick red.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tile, 18th century.
18th century. Tin-enamelled earthenware. Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund. 1938-12-6.
